name: The Flail Scale Tale
description:
The once was a flail, and this is its tale, lets see how it scales before the good prevails! 

Instructions: WASD to control the character. The flail is your weapon and it follows the mouse as fast as it can depending on its size, use it to crush your foes. You can click your Left Mouse button to grow your flail and your Right Mouse button to reduce its size. 

Try to kill as many enemies as you can to grow and become a beautiful [REDACTED]
